name: DustStorm
description: Project DustStorm is an interactive narrative-based game that centers around the protagonist, a member of a company, who is compelled to rush home and take shelter from an impending sandstorm. The game utilizes a combination of character interactions and environmental design to convey information on self-protection measures and to immerse the player in the experience of the sandstorm using realistic particle effects. The game's interactive design enables the player to indirectly experience the scene and potential events that may occur during the sandstorm.
